links.title: Barclays Shares Jump as Covid-19 Boosts Investment Bank Performance. That Could Be Good News for the Dividend.
links.description: Shares in Barclays rose more than 7% on Friday after the bank beat profit forecasts for the third quarter of 2020. However, the lender warned that the economic outlook was worsening, which could lead to more cost cuts. The back story.

messages.body:
$HSBC SBC call volume above normal and directionally bullish
Bullish option flow detected in HSBC with 5,575 calls trading, 3x expected, and implied vol increasing over 1 point to 39.08%. 10/30 weekly 20.5 calls and Jan-21 20 puts are the most active options, with total volume in those strikes near 5,500 contracts. The Put/Call Ratio is 0.27. Earnings are expected on October 27th.

messages.body: $HSBC HSBC US Global Liquidity and Cash Management Adds Cash Flow Forecasting to HSBCnet https://www.otcdynamics.com/hsbc-hsbc-us-global-liquidity-and-cash-management-adds-cash-flow-forecasting-to-hsbcnet

links.title: $HSBC HSBC US Global Liquidity and Cash Management Adds Cash Flow Forecasting to HSBCnet
links.description: "In the midst of the COVID-19 pandemic, firms are realizing that having accurate cash flow visibility is more important now than ever," said Drew Douglas, Head of Liquidity & Cash Management, US and Canada. "Efficient cash flow forecasting is critical to effective liquidity management, allowing clients to better understand their future working capital and liquidity needs, to budget effectively, and to support efficient reporting.

messages.body:
$HSBC HSBC US Global Liquidity and Cash Management Adds Cash Flow Forecasting to HSBCnet
https://www.stocktitan.net/news/HSBC/hsbc-us-global-liquidity-and-cash-management-adds-cash-flow-wns9yunvqi8y.html

links.title: HSBC US Global Liquidity and Cash Management Adds Cash Flow | StockTitan.net
links.description: NEW YORK--()--HSBC Bank USA today announced the availability of HSBC Cash Flow Forecasting, a fully-integrated forecasting solution that allows businesses to build a more accurate picture of their future finances and manage liquidity. HSBC Cash Flow Forecasting is accessed via the bank's digital banking platform, HSBCnet, providing clients with a single point of access for all their cash management needs.

links.title: HSBC targets net zero emissions by 2050, earmarks $1 trillion green
links.description: (Reuters) - HSBC will target net zero carbon emissions across its entire customer base by 2050 at the latest, and provide between $750 billion and $1 trillion in financing to help clients make the transition, its Chief Executive Noel Quinn told Reuters.

messages.body: European Bank Mergers Won't Solve Anything $HSBC $BNOBF $DB https://talkmarkets.com/content/global-markets/european-bank-mergers-wont-solve-anything?post=280595

links.title: European Bank Mergers Won't Solve Anything
links.description: Are we witnessing a movement of European bank mergers? Rumors have been circulating for several years about a merger between Commerzbank and Deutsche Bank or with BNP Paribas, between Société Générale and Unicredit, but nothing has happened so far. But lately, several mergers have taken place.
